dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. They have a very relaxed personality, and, despite them being a subspecies, they are considered the elders of the metal record species. They also have a great variety of knowledge which is not just useful in improving the lives of members of their fellow species, but is also used to give useful advice to humans which has helped them to gain recognition among normal people, too.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner,
we don't mind being fused but
please use us wisely.
